channel.title: Man is not a thing
channel.description:
This series presents a discussion of the discoveries and errors of Sigmund Freud and his impact on the American family, politics and religion.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Freud and religion
item.description: This program, "Freud and Religion," looks at how Freud's theories relate to religion.
item.dc:creator: Harter, John
item.dc:subject: Psychology & Mental Health

item.title: Freud and the American child
item.description: This program, "Freud and the American Child," looks at Freud's theories about childhood.
item.dc:creator: Harter, John
item.dc:subject: Psychology & Mental Health

item.title: Freud and the American democracy
item.description: This program, "Freud and the American Democracy," looks at how Freud's theories apply to American democracy.
item.dc:creator: Harter, John
item.dc:subject: Psychology & Mental Health

item.title: Freud and the American father
item.description: This program, "Freud and the American Father," looks at how Freud's theories apply to American fathers.
item.dc:creator: Harter, John
item.dc:subject: Psychology & Mental Health

item.title: Freud and the social sciences
item.description: This program, "Freud and the Social Sciences," looks at how Freud's theories relate to other social sciences.
item.dc:creator: Harter, John
item.dc:subject: Psychology & Mental Health

item.title: Freud and the American consumer
item.description: This program, "Freud and the American Consumer," looks at how Freud's theories relate to the habits of American consumers.
item.dc:creator: Harter, John
item.dc:subject: Psychology & Mental Health

item.title: Freud in perspective
item.description: This program presents a selection of psychology experts putting "Freud in Perspective."
item.dc:creator: Harter, John
item.dc:subject: Psychology & Mental Health

item.title: Freud, authority and the American consumer
item.description: This program, "Freud, Authority and the American Consumer," looks at how Freud's theories relate to aspects of American life.
item.dc:creator: Harter, John
item.dc:subject: Psychology & Mental Health

item.title: Freud and the American mother
item.description: This program, "Freud and the American Mother," looks at how Freud's theories apply to American mothers.
item.dc:creator: Harter, John
item.dc:subject: Psychology & Mental Health
